description: This table contains information on queries sent during coding (including documentation queries) and clinical documentation improvement (CDI) reviews.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the notes record.

columns.name: PATIENT_ID
columns.description: The patient associated with the coding query.

columns.name: CCR_EMP_ID
columns.description: The user who created the coding query.

columns.name: CCR_NOTE_DT_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the coding query created.

columns.name: CCR_NOTE_SUMMARY
columns.description: The subject line (free text) of the coding query.

columns.name: CCR_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the coding query.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Query Pending


Query Sent


Response Received


Completed


Deleted


Reassigned


Deactivated

columns.name: CCR_ASSN_TO_EMP_ID
columns.description: The user to whom the coding query was sent.

columns.name: CCR_HOSP_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account associated with the coding query.

columns.name: QUERY_WORKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The workflow type category number for the query. NULL or 0 is returned for a coding query.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Coding Query


CDI Query


Coding Documentation Deficiency

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the patient contact associated with this coding query. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: COD_QRY_HNO_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coding query type category number for the query.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


All Other

columns.name: CDI_QRY_HNO_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The clinical documentation improvement (CDI) query type category number for the query.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


All Other

columns.name: CODING_DOC_DFI_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the deficiency which is associated with a documentation query. This column is frequently used to link to the DFI_DETAILS table.

columns.name: CODING_DOC_CREATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The creation method category ID for the documentation query.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Automatic Deficiency Creation


Manual Deficiency Creation


Added to Existing Deficiency

columns.name: CCR_ASSN_TO_POOL_ID
columns.description: The pool to whom the documentation query was sent.

columns.name: CCR_ASSN_TO_POOL_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: CCR_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The query outcome category ID for the query. This indicates the conclusion of the query (recipient agrees, disagrees, or doesn't respond).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Recipient Agreed � Documentation Updated


Recipient Agreed � Documentation Not Updated


Recipient Disagreed


Recipient Did Not Respond


Auto Completed - Provider Response Received


Auto Completed - Query Still Outstanding

columns.name: RESP_USER_ID
columns.description: To store the provider's ID whose response to a query satisfies the query sender.

columns.name: QRY_RESP_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Holds the note ID of the note used to respond to a coding/CDI query.

columns.name: QRY_RESP_SMRTTXT_ID
columns.description: Specifies the smart text to use to populate a new note in response to a query.

columns.name: QRY_RESP_SMRTTXT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: DOC_QRY_REP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the reporting workflow of the query based on the presence of an attached deficiency. Use this instead of workflow value when breaking CDI and Coding queries out by whether they are a documentation query as well.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Coding Query


CDI Query


Coding Documentation Query


CDI Documentation Query

columns.name: CCR_UPD_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the query was updated, in UTC time.

columns.name: CCR_NOTE_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the coding query was created, in UTC time.

columns.name: QRY_SUGG_RESP_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the suggested response note linked to the query.
